definition: to encircle/to surround/all around/to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)
to gather together/to collect/to approach/to draw near to/to add/to sum up/to comb (hair)

sentences.english: Then, more than security over crowded.
sentences.chinese: 隨即，多名保安圍攏過來。

sentences.english: We all drew around at the desk.
Passers –by crowded round the policeman as be made his arrest.
sentences.chinese: 當警察逮捕罪犯時，旁觀者圍攏過來。

sentences.english: The other librarians gathered around as she handed me a package.
sentences.chinese: 她遞給我一個包裹時，其他圖書管理員也圍攏了過來。

sentences.english: The wild boar backed and filled as the wolves circled and took nips.
sentences.chinese: 當狼圍攏來進攻時，野豬來回走動，不知所措。
